txt.en: DNT
Spears of War
Retrieve spears from the Taurogrim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Claw and fang are enough for me to win most any fight. I am no fool though. Sometimes a spear is a much needed weapon when the odds are against you, or the hunt is too dangerous! For that reason, we Beornings of the Floodfells have hidden caches of spears throughout the lands. Go south, to the cave Tithroz, and find the spears within. It is our largest cache. There should be many spears inside; many more than you would be able to carry.'
Place the collected spears in barrels at Limlók ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Empty barrels can be found in Limlók.\n\nYou should place the spears in the empty barrels.
DNT Yrsa said there would be more spears here
DNT
These chips of bark look like they belonged to Taurogrim!
Gather spears from within Tithroz ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Search for the remaining spears
DNT Found them!
Spears can be found in the cave of Tithroz in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should collect the spears from Tithroz.
A clue can be found in the cave of Tithroz in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should search Tithroz for sign of the missing spears.
Taurogrim can be found at Shulgmokh in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should seek out the Taurogrim.
Spears can be found in the cave of Tithroz in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should collect the spears from Tithroz.
Taurogrim can be found at Shulgmokh in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should defeat Taurogrim and retrieve the missing spears.
Gathered spears from within Tithroz ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Yrsa Spearwife, wife of Runerik and chief warrior of Limlók, seeks to defend her village at any cost.
'Claw and fang are enough for me to win most any fight.'
